pros: It's mission-driven, and some of the folks are good to work with
cons: I worked here for three years and was very disappointed with my experience. The organization is disorganized and chaotic. The CEO is also very incompetent and makes many decisions driven by his ego, which makes the place really toxic. All decisions are driven by personal nonsense rather than the best interests of the organization, the staff, and the community it says it is about. For example, the organization recently returned to its inferior resource platform. It's poorly designed and much more challenging to use than the competition without even a 1/10 of the functionality.

pros: Friendly employees, positive environment and meaningful work
cons: None that I can think of

pros: Great group of people that are dedicated to making an impact in local communities through the use of technology.
cons: It is a small group, meaning things can be hectic at times when deadlines and expansions are near.

review_title: This is a great place to work
pros: Everyone is mission-aligned and ready to do the work.
cons: I can't think of any cons.

pros: Great team and everyone aligned on mission to help underserved individuals find community resources
If you want to learn, this is the place.
cons: There is no work flow in team.

pros: Nice team members and making a difference
